target.rawSql:
WITH RankedData AS (
    SELECT
        created_at,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY created_at ASC) as rn,
        COUNT(*) OVER () as total_rows
    FROM ${selected_table:raw}
),
Boundaries AS (
    SELECT
        MIN(CASE WHEN rn = 1 THEN created_at END) as time_start,
        MIN(CASE WHEN rn = FLOOR(total_rows / 3) THEN created_at END) as time_level2_start,
        MIN(CASE WHEN rn = FLOOR(2 * total_rows / 3) THEN created_at END) as time_level3_start,
        MAX(created_at) as time_end
    FROM RankedData
)
SELECT
    time_start AS time,
    time_level2_start AS timeEnd,
    'Level 1' AS text,
    'level,level1' AS tags
FROM Boundaries
WHERE time_level2_start IS NOT NULL

UNION ALL

SELECT
    time_level2_start AS time,
    time_level3_start AS timeEnd,
    'Level 2' AS text,
    'level,level2' AS tags
FROM Boundaries
WHERE time_level2_start IS NOT NULL AND time_level3_start IS NOT NULL

UNION ALL

SELECT
    time_level3_start AS time,
    time_end + INTERVAL 1 MICROSECOND AS timeEnd, 
    'Level 3' AS text,
    'level,level3' AS tags
FROM Boundaries
WHERE time_level3_start IS NOT NULL;

    UNION ALL
    SELECT created_at, `precision`, `recall`, `relevancy`, `rouge1`, `cosine_similarity`, 'vector_dense_search_metrics' AS table_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY 'vector_dense_search_metrics' ORDER BY created_at ASC) as rn FROM vector_dense_search_metrics
    UNION ALL
    SELECT created_at, `precision`, `recall`, `relevancy`, `rouge1`, `cosine_similarity`, 'vector_hybrid_search_metrics' AS table_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY 'vector_hybrid_search_metrics' ORDER BY created_at ASC) as rn FROM vector_hybrid_search_metrics
    UNION ALL
    SELECT created_at, `precision`, `recall`, `relevancy`, `rouge1`, `cosine_similarity`, 'graph_classical_drift_search_metrics' AS table_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY 'graph_classical_drift_search_metrics' ORDER BY created_at ASC) as rn FROM graph_classical_drift_search_metrics
    UNION ALL
    SELECT created_at, `precision`, `recall`, `relevancy`, `rouge1`, `cosine_similarity`, 'graph_classical_global_search_metrics' AS table_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY 'graph_classical_global_search_metrics' ORDER BY created_at ASC) as rn FROM graph_classical_global_search_metrics
    UNION ALL
    SELECT created_at, `precision`, `recall`, `relevancy`, `rouge1`, `cosine_similarity`, 'graph_classical_local_search_metrics' AS table_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY 'graph_classical_local_search_metrics' ORDER BY created_at ASC) as rn FROM graph_classical_local_search_metrics
    UNION ALL
    SELECT created_at, `precision`, `recall`, `relevancy`, `rouge1`, `cosine_similarity`, 'graph_llm_drift_search_metrics' AS table_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY 'graph_llm_drift_search_metrics' ORDER BY created_at ASC) as rn FROM graph_llm_drift_search_metrics
    UNION ALL
    SELECT created_at, `precision`, `recall`, `relevancy`, `rouge1`, `cosine_similarity`, 'graph_llm_global_search_metrics' AS table_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY 'graph_llm_global_search_metrics' ORDER BY created_at ASC) as rn FROM graph_llm_global_search_metrics
    UNION ALL
    SELECT created_at, `precision`, `recall`, `relevancy`, `rouge1`, `cosine_similarity`, 'graph_llm_local_search_metrics' AS table_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY 'graph_llm_local_search_metrics' ORDER BY created_at ASC) as rn FROM graph_llm_local_search_metrics
)
SELECT
    table_name AS `Table Name`,
    CAST(AVG(CASE WHEN rn BETWEEN 1 AND 18 THEN `precision` ELSE NULL END) AS DECIMAL(10,4)) AS `Avg Precision L1`
FROM RankedData
GROUP BY table_name
HAVING AVG(CASE WHEN rn BETWEEN 1 AND 18 THEN `precision` ELSE NULL END) IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY `Avg Precision L1` DESC;

panels.title: Precision Ranking (All Tables - Highest is Best)

panels.title: Level 1 Avg Score Ranking (Rows 1-18 - Higher is Best)

targets.rawSql:
WITH RankedData AS (
    SELECT created_at, `precision`, `recall`, `relevancy`, `rouge1`, `cosine_similarity`, 'vector_sparse_search_metrics' AS table_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY 'vector_sparse_search_metrics' ORDER BY created_at ASC) as rn FROM vector_sparse_search_metrics
    UNION ALL
    SELECT created_at, `precision`, `recall`, `relevancy`, `rouge1`, `cosine_similarity`, 'vector_dense_search_metrics' AS table_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY 'vector_dense_search_metrics' ORDER BY created_at ASC) as rn FROM vector_dense_search_metrics
    UNION ALL
    SELECT created_at, `precision`, `recall`, `relevancy`, `rouge1`, `cosine_similarity`, 'vector_hybrid_search_metrics' AS table_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY 'vector_hybrid_search_metrics' ORDER BY created_at ASC) as rn FROM vector_hybrid_search_metrics
    UNION ALL
    SELECT created_at, `precision`, `recall`, `relevancy`, `rouge1`, `cosine_similarity`, 'graph_classical_drift_search_metrics' AS table_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY 'graph_classical_drift_search_metrics' ORDER BY created_at ASC) as rn FROM graph_classical_drift_search_metrics
    UNION ALL
    SELECT created_at, `precision`, `recall`, `relevancy`, `rouge1`, `cosine_similarity`, 'graph_classical_global_search_metrics' AS table_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY 'graph_classical_global_search_metrics' ORDER BY created_at ASC) as rn FROM graph_classical_global_search_metrics
    UNION ALL
    SELECT created_at, `precision`, `recall`, `relevancy`, `rouge1`, `cosine_similarity`, 'graph_classical_local_search_metrics' AS table_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY 'graph_classical_local_search_metrics' ORDER BY created_at ASC) as rn FROM graph_classical_local_search_metrics
    UNION ALL
    SELECT created_at, `precision`, `recall`, `relevancy`, `rouge1`, `cosine_similarity`, 'graph_llm_drift_search_metrics' AS table_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY 'graph_llm_drift_search_metrics' ORDER BY created_at ASC) as rn FROM graph_llm_drift_search_metrics
    UNION ALL
    SELECT created_at, `precision`, `recall`, `relevancy`, `rouge1`, `cosine_similarity`, 'graph_llm_global_search_metrics' AS table_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY 'graph_llm_global_search_metrics' ORDER BY created_at ASC) as rn FROM graph_llm_global_search_metrics
    UNION ALL
    SELECT created_at, `precision`, `recall`, `relevancy`, `rouge1`, `cosine_similarity`, 'graph_llm_local_search_metrics' AS table_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY 'graph_llm_local_search_metrics' ORDER BY created_at ASC) as rn FROM graph_llm_local_search_metrics
),
TableScores AS (
    SELECT
        table_name AS `Table Name`,
        AVG(CASE WHEN rn BETWEEN 1 AND 18 THEN (`precision` + `recall` + `relevancy` + `rouge1` + `cosine_similarity`) / 5 ELSE NULL END) AS `Level 1 Avg Score`,
        AVG(CASE WHEN rn BETWEEN 19 AND 36 THEN (`precision` + `recall` + `relevancy` + `rouge1` + `cosine_similarity`) / 5 ELSE NULL END) AS `Level 2 Avg Score`,
        AVG(CASE WHEN rn BETWEEN 37 AND 54 THEN (`precision` + `recall` + `relevancy` + `rouge1` + `cosine_similarity`) / 5 ELSE NULL END) AS `Level 3 Avg Score`,
         AVG((`precision` + `recall` + `relevancy` + `rouge1` + `cosine_similarity`) / 5) AS `Overall Avg Score`
    FROM RankedData
    GROUP BY table_name
)
SELECT
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY `Level 1 Avg Score` DESC) AS `Rank`,
    `Table Name`,
    CAST(`Level 1 Avg Score` AS DECIMAL(10,4)) AS `Level 1 Avg Score`
FROM TableScores
ORDER BY `Rank` ASC;

    SELECT created_at, `precision`, `recall`, `relevancy`, `rouge1`, `cosine_similarity`, 'graph_llm_drift_search_metrics' AS table_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY 'graph_llm_drift_search_metrics' ORDER BY created_at ASC) as rn FROM graph_llm_drift_search_metrics
    UNION ALL
    SELECT created_at, `precision`, `recall`, `relevancy`, `rouge1`, `cosine_similarity`, 'graph_llm_global_search_metrics' AS table_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY 'graph_llm_global_search_metrics' ORDER BY created_at ASC) as rn FROM graph_llm_global_search_metrics
    UNION ALL
    SELECT created_at, `precision`, `recall`, `relevancy`, `rouge1`, `cosine_similarity`, 'graph_llm_local_search_metrics' AS table_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY 'graph_llm_local_search_metrics' ORDER BY created_at ASC) as rn FROM graph_llm_local_search_metrics
),
TableScores AS (
    SELECT
        table_name AS `Table Name`,
        AVG(CASE WHEN rn BETWEEN 1 AND 18 THEN (`precision` + `recall` + `relevancy` + `rouge1` + `cosine_similarity`) / 5 ELSE NULL END) AS `Level 1 Avg Score`,
        AVG(CASE WHEN rn BETWEEN 19 AND 36 THEN (`precision` + `recall` + `relevancy` + `rouge1` + `cosine_similarity`) / 5 ELSE NULL END) AS `Level 2 Avg Score`,
        AVG(CASE WHEN rn BETWEEN 37 AND 54 THEN (`precision` + `recall` + `relevancy` + `rouge1` + `cosine_similarity`) / 5 ELSE NULL END) AS `Level 3 Avg Score`,
         AVG((`precision` + `recall` + `relevancy` + `rouge1` + `cosine_similarity`) / 5) AS `Overall Avg Score`
    FROM RankedData
    GROUP BY table_name
)
SELECT
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY `Overall Avg Score` DESC) AS `Rank`,
    `Table Name`,
    CAST(`Overall Avg Score` AS DECIMAL(10,4)) AS `Overall Avg Score`
FROM TableScores
ORDER BY `Rank` ASC;

panels.title: Selected Query Details by Level and Retriever (Example Rows 1, 19, 37)

targets.rawSql:
WITH RankedData AS (
    SELECT created_at, `query`, `search_type`, `retrieval_context`, `expected_output`, `actual_output`, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY `search_type` ORDER BY created_at ASC) as rn FROM vector_sparse_search_metrics
    UNION ALL
    SELECT created_at, `query`, `search_type`, `retrieval_context`, `expected_output`, `actual_output`, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY `search_type` ORDER BY created_at ASC) as rn FROM vector_dense_search_metrics
    UNION ALL
    SELECT created_at, `query`, `search_type`, `retrieval_context`, `expected_output`, `actual_output`, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY `search_type` ORDER BY created_at ASC) as rn FROM vector_hybrid_search_metrics
    UNION ALL
    SELECT created_at, `query`, `search_type`, `retrieval_context`, `expected_output`, `actual_output`, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY `search_type` ORDER BY created_at ASC) as rn FROM graph_classical_drift_search_metrics
    UNION ALL
    SELECT created_at, `query`, `search_type`, `retrieval_context`, `expected_output`, `actual_output`, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY `search_type` ORDER BY created_at ASC) as rn FROM graph_classical_global_search_metrics
    UNION ALL
    SELECT created_at, `query`, `search_type`, `retrieval_context`, `expected_output`, `actual_output`, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY `search_type` ORDER BY created_at ASC) as rn FROM graph_classical_local_search_metrics
    UNION ALL
    SELECT created_at, `query`, `search_type`, `retrieval_context`, `expected_output`, `actual_output`, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY `search_type` ORDER BY created_at ASC) as rn FROM graph_llm_drift_search_metrics
    UNION ALL
    SELECT created_at, `query`, `search_type`, `retrieval_context`, `expected_output`, `actual_output`, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY `search_type` ORDER BY created_at ASC) as rn FROM graph_llm_global_search_metrics
    UNION ALL
    SELECT created_at, `query`, `search_type`, `retrieval_context`, `expected_output`, `actual_output`, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY `search_type` ORDER BY created_at ASC) as rn FROM graph_llm_local_search_metrics
) 
SELECT
    -- Identify the level based on the row number
    CASE rn
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Level 1'
        WHEN 19 THEN 'Level 2'
        WHEN 37 THEN 'Level 3'
        ELSE 'Unknown Level' -- Should not happen with the WHERE clause
    END AS `Level`,
    `query` AS `Query`,
    `search_type` AS `Retriever Type`,
    `retrieval_context` AS `Retrieval Context`,
    `expected_output` AS `Expected Output`,
    `actual_output` AS `Actual Output`
FROM RankedData
WHERE rn IN (1, 19, 37) -- Select the representative row numbers for each level
ORDER BY rn ASC, `search_type` ASC; -- Order by question level (based on rn) then retriever type
